name: Golden Crypt Conqueror
description:
Golden Crypt Conqueror by Simon Wilson
======================================

In this brain teasing platformer game you control the fate of an honorable explorer on his quests through the golden lost pyramids to recover the ancient treasures.

Collect as much coin as you travel and save your lives for the more difficult puzzles but beware to make sure you plan ahead or else you may find yourself trapped forever!
